subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: At Floyd Landis’s arbitration hearing, Tour de France champion Greg LeMond said he had been sexually abused as a child and that the Landis camp had tried to use this fact to blackmail him.
snippet: At Floyd Landis’s arbitration hearing, Tour de France champion Greg LeMond said he had been sexually abused as a child and that the Landis camp had tried to use this fact to blackmail him.
